page.title: 13HISTORIC BUILDINGS, CORSHAM
page.content: When people visit Corsham they either stay in the Methuen Arms Hotel or the Stagecoach Motel.The Methuen Arms Hotel has a restaurant and 24 rooms. The Stagecoach Motel has 21 rooms. It has lots of facilities including a swimming pool.People stay in Corsham because it is quiet and close to places like Bath,Lacock and Castle Combe.The two main tourist attractions are St.Batholomew's Church and Corsham Court. Corsham Court is owned by the Methuen family. It was rebuilt after a fire in 1582.The gallery contains thousands of pictures including one by Van Dyck.The gardens are very large and beautiful. St Bartholomew's Church is also very beautiful. Tourists might be attracted by the Methuen Chapel or the grave of Sarah Jarvis,who cut her second set of teeth shortly before she died at the age of 103.
